member.summary: Contains information used to identify whether or not a given institution is open.

member.name: T:DataTransferObjects.Public.OpeningHours.OpeningHourEmployeeDTO
member.summary: Containing public information about a single employee in an institution.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.Public.OpeningHours.OpeningHourEmployeeDTO.Id

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.Public.OpeningHours.OpeningHourEmployeeDTO.FirstName
member.summary: The first name of the employee.

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.Public.OpeningHours.OpeningHoursDTO.Id

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.Public.OpeningHours.OpeningHoursDTO.Close

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.Public.OpeningHours.OpeningHoursDTO.CheckedInEmployees

member.name: P:DataTransferObjects.Public.Employees.EmployeeDTO.PhotoRef
